QuestData.Title: Encroaching Twilight
QuestData.Description: Fragile Twilight invaders litter the redoubt. They're pouring in from somewhere to the west.$B$BThere can be no mercy offered to them within this hallowed place. Whatever violence grips your moral heart, release it upon them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 12 Twilight invaders within the Vermillion Redoubt.
QuestData.CompletionText: It was inevitable I suppose. We've kept them out for far longer than I thought we could. They were sure to find a way eventually.
QuestData.RewardText: You have a talent for killing I see. In times like these, that has its place.
